"Unpacking the Envy" - A creative solution to overcome jealousy by embracing the journey of self-discovery.
"The Traveler's Guide to Jealousy" - A travel-inspired journal designed to help you navigate the ups and downs of life.
"The Weightless Suitcase" - A meditation and mindfulness exercise to help you let go of envy and find inner peace.
"The Suitcase of Dreams" - A creative outlet for manifesting your desires and overcoming envy.
"The Suitcase of Gratitude" - A daily gratitude journal to help you cultivate a sense of appreciation and overcome envy.
